message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135? It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget for this purchase.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $130? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $122. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget is tight, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $128? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can we meet at this price?
